mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, writer, created_at as createdAt, COALESCE(like_count, 0) as likeCount FROM board ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, content, writer, created_at as createdAt, COALESCE(like_count, 0) as likeCount FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
